page.title: 17 A TYPICAL WEEKEND BY TINA
page.content: After school on Friday,at about 3.15,I catch the school bus but get off at Budleigh Salterton to meet my boyfriend Martin & go for a cup of coffee in Country Kitchens.I then go home,have tea,have a bath,wash my hair & change. Martin calls around 6.30 & we walk to the pub, then to the weekly Youth Club at the Village Hall.On Saturday morning,I am picked up at 11.20 & go to work as a waitress at the Otter Pub in Colyton Raleigh.In the afternoon,I meet Martin in B.S.& we sit on the beach or walk around the town if it is fine.We spend the evening in the pub or the Chinese Restaurant in B.S. On Sunday,I work at the same time,then I watch Martin play cricket & later listen to records or watch T.V. at home. {by Tina Matthews (aged 15) of East Budleigh}
